parameters.name: ConfigId
parameters.description: The ID of the configuration. For more information about ConfigId, see [Usage notes on ConfigId](~~388994~~).

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The accelerated domain name. You can specify only one domain name in each request.

parameters.name: FunctionNames
parameters.description: The names of the features. Separate multiple feature names with commas (,). For more information, see [Parameters for configuring features for domain names](~~388460~~).
